Summary: Fast Black Triangle over my head
divs: Sighting DetailsOn my way to the train station I saw a Black Triangle object, it was under the height a plane usually is flying and doesn't make any sound... however first of all the sighting lasted just a few seconds (2-3 seconds) but it was close enough that I have been able to describe it to myself as Triangle like and entirely black - with no light on it... however it was a alley so I lost the view on it, in this moment I rushed to the next crossroad where I had a better view, on this position I was able to see it again, but the position was far away, but still I recognized the object (it was about 30 seconds later), after short time I wasn't able to see it anymore. I wasn't able to take a picture (unfortunately because it would be a kind of proof for Triangle UFO's), but I drawed a sketch (it's not very exact, as the sighting lasted for a very short time, I made the sketch from the way I described the UFO to myself during the short close encounter). The Triangle was kinda cut-up, so it was triangle like but also a bit different, I tried to draw this as good as possible on my sketch.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Vienna
There were no other sightings in Vienna on or around February 13th 2011
This sighting has never been favorited.
